job_history.role_name: Customer Service Rep 1 Lead, Quality Assurance Coach, Account Relationship Specialist, Online Banking Rep II
job_history.work_description: Answered customer calls, managed the floor, reviewed calls for performance and compliance, coached agents, and managed the Outbound team. Provided first line of support for the Online manager, monitored the floor, and assisted with tasks.

job_history.role_name: Front Desk/ Fitness Advisor/ General Manager/ Operations Manager/ Regional Sales Manager
job_history.work_description: Started as a Front desk staff, promoted to Fitness Advisor, then to Sales Manager, and eventually managed multiple clubs. Created spreadsheets, worked corporate deals, trained staff, and exceeded sales quotas.
Moved through various jobs in the crew, including RTO Radio Transmission Operator, Gunner, Loader, and Advance Party. Completed one tour of Iraq and was trained in various medical and combat courses.
